level.heading: Remuneration of directors.
level.text: Unless the organic rules otherwise provide, the board of directors may set the remuneration of directors and of nondirector committee members appointed under § 29-1008.17(a).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-378
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based on § 810 of the Uniform Limited Cooperative Association Act. Edition
